name: exalted soul
description: +1 to max class points; recover 1 class point on init

name: near death experience
description: 1/LR, on reaching 0 HP, instead remain at 1 HP and gain dmg and condi immunity until end of the turn

name: beacon of ytar
description: during each SR, can replenish a single resource with a LR cooldown

name: alacrity
description: +3 dmg with basic wep atks and cantrips

name: sixth sense
description: +3 non-phys res

name: juggernaut
description: +2 to saves to end ongoing action/movement impairing condis. additionally, whenever you are afflicted with a similar condi, 30% chance to heal 5 HP

name: earthen might
description: 20% chance to recover 2 class points on limited feature use

name: sword and board
description: while holding a shield, +1 dmg res and 10% chance to refund spent class points

name: rampage
description: when foe dies within 120' of you, +1 global dmg and +1 dmg res until rest

name: pound of flesh
description: after 1+ healing surges, +1 passive regen and +5' sp until rest

name: ruthless
description: +3 global dmg vs bloodied targets

name: weapons master
description: +5 $weaponClass dmg

name: inspiring presence
description: your buffs have double duration; on buff use, you and allies within 5' gain +1 passive regen until LR

name: berserker rage
description: while you have full class points/spell slots, +5 global dmg

name: bloodthirst
description: on spending class points/spell slots, heal 6 HP

name: superstition
description: +1 non-phys res; when hit by ranged or non-phys, 20% chance to recover 1 class point

name: tough as nails
description: +2 dmg res; +3 dmg thorns

name: no escape
description: +4 global dmg vs targets 60'+ away

name: relentless
description: while bloodied, 20% chance to refund spent class points, +1 incoming healing, and +1 dmg res

name: brawler
description: with 2+ adj foes, +3 global dmg

name: jungle fortitude
description: +2 dmg res; +1 minion dmg res

name: circle of life
description: when adj foe dies, 20% chance to use a minion summoning power for free

name: gruesome feast
description: when healed by a power, recover 1 spell slot lvl, and gain +1 global dmg and gain +1 dmg res for combat

name: blood ritual
description: 20% chance to refund spent spell slots; using a spell slot costs HP equal to double the slot lvl; +1 passive regen

name: bad medicine
description: on $nonPhysType hit, target has -3 global dmg until end of your next turn

name: zombie handler
description: +5 max HP; +3 minion HP; +3 minion dmg

name: pierce the veil
description: +15 spell dmg; spell slot costs are increased 1 lvl

name: fetish sycophants
description: on hit, 20% chance to use a minion summoning power for free

name: rush of essence
description: 20% chance to refund spent spell slots

name: vision quest
description: on hit, recover 2 spell slot lvls

name: fierce loyalty
description: while you have a minion, +20' sp, doubled while not in combat; +2 minion dmg; +1 minion HP

name: grave injustice
description: when adj foe dies, heal 1 HP, recover 1 spell slot lvl, and recover single SR-cooldown resource

name: confidence ritual
description: +5 melee dmg

name: creeping death
description: your DoT and mark durations are doubled

name: swampland attunement
description: +2 dmg res for each adj foe; +1 minion dmg res for each adj foe

name: midnight feast
description: +5 minion dmg; +4 minion HP

name: blur
description: +3 dmg res

name: glass cannon
description: +5 global dmg, -2 dmg res

name: prodigy
description: on cantrip cast, recover 2 spell slot lvls

name: illusionist
description: 1/turn, when hit, recover single SR-cooldown resource; on limited feature use, +5' sp until end of turn

name: cold blooded
description: creatures condi'd by you have -2 dmg res

name: conflagration
description: on $nonPhysType hit, target grants incoming atks -1 crit req until end of their next turn

name: paralysis
description: on $nonPhysType hit, 20% chance to stun until end of target's next turn

name: galvanising ward
description: on turn start where you haven't taken dmg since last turn, gain 7 temp HP

name: temporal flux
description: on $nonPhysType hit, target slowed for combat; +2 global dmg vs condi'd targets

name: dominance
description: on KB, gain 9 temp HP

name: arcane dynamo
description: on cantrip cast, next non-cantrip spell deals +6 dmg. no stack

name: unwavering will
description: if you haven't moved since start of your last turn, +2 dmg res and +1 global dmg

name: elemental exposure
description: on non-phys hit, target gets -1 dmg res until end of your next turn

name: resolve
description: on hit, target gets -3 global dmg until end of your next turn

name: chant of resonance
description: 20% chance on limited buff use to refund cost; on init while buffed, recover 1 class point

name: seize the initiative
description: on hit vs healthy target, +2 global dmg until end of your next turn

name: the guardian's path
description: while dual-wielding, +2 to $abilityScore saves; while holding 2h wep, recover 3 class points on init

name: determination
description: +2 global dmg for each adj foe

name: relentless assault
description: +3 global dmg vs condi'd targets

name: harmony
description: your single-type res affixes are halved, but apply to all dmg instead

name: combination strike
description: each successive instance of dmg you deal after the first per turn deals +3 dmg

name: unity
description: for each ally buffed by you, +1 global dmg; allies buffed by you have +1 global dmg

name: momentum
description: +7 dmg with charge atks

name: mythic rhythm
description: on basic wep atk, next limited wep atk you make deals +6 dmg. no stack
